languages.text: "Я понимаю твое желание. Традиции и старые уклады должны меняться — я позволю тебе вернуться на Даргонус после того, как минует непосредственный кризис в Просторе".

traits.locale_text: [draft] Предложить возглавить свой род и стать частью дворянства Даргонуса и всей торговой империи фон Воланциус

languages.text: "I understand your desire. Traditions and old ways must change — I will allow you to return to Dargonus after the immediate crisis in the Expanse has passed."
languages.original_text: "Я понимаю твое желание. Традиции и старые уклады должны меняться — я позволю тебе вернуться на Даргонус после того, как минует непосредственный кризис в Просторе".

traits.locale_text: "I understand your desire. Traditions and old ways must change — I will allow you to return to Dargonus after the immediate crisis in the Expanse has passed."
"I understand your desire. Traditions and old ways must change — I will allow you to return to Dargonus after the immediate crisis in the Expanse has passed."
"I understand your desire. Traditions and old ways must change — I will allow you to return to Dargonus after the immediate crisis in the Expanse has passed."
"I understand your desire. Traditions and old ways must change — I will allow you to return to Dargonus after the immediate crisis in the Expanse has passed."
"I understand your desire. Traditions and old ways must change — I will allow you to return to Dargonus after the immediate crisis in the Expanse has passed."

languages.text: "Ich verstehe Euren Wunsch. Traditionen und alte Gewohnheiten müssen sich ändern. Ich gestatte Euch, nach Dargonus zurückzukehren, wenn die unmittelbare Krise in der Ausdehnung ausgestanden ist."
languages.original_text: "I understand your desire. Traditions and old ways must change — I will allow you to return to Dargonus after the immediate crisis in the Expanse has passed."

traits.locale_text: "Ich verstehe Euren Wunsch. Traditionen und alte Gewohnheiten müssen sich ändern. Ich gestatte Euch, nach Dargonus zurückzukehren, wenn die unmittelbare Krise in der Ausdehnung ausgestanden ist."

languages.text: « Je comprends votre souhait. Les traditions et les vieilles coutumes doivent changer. Je vous permettrai de retourner sur Dargonus une fois que nous aurons mis fin à la crise qui secoue les Étendues. »
languages.original_text: "I understand your desire. Traditions and old ways must change — I will allow you to return to Dargonus after the immediate crisis in the Expanse has passed."

traits.locale_text: « Je comprends votre souhait. Les traditions et les vieilles coutumes doivent changer. Je vous permettrai de retourner sur Dargonus une fois que nous aurons mis fin à la crise qui secoue les Étendues. »

languages.text: “我理解你的愿望，陈规旧习也是得改改了。等科罗努斯扩区的危机结束之后，我就允许你返回达戈努斯。”
languages.original_text: "I understand your desire. Traditions and old ways must change — I will allow you to return to Dargonus after the immediate crisis in the Expanse has passed."

traits.locale_text: “我理解你的愿望，陈规旧习也是得改改了。等科罗努斯扩区的危机结束之后，我就允许你返回达戈努斯。”

languages.text: 「望みは理解している。伝統と古い仕来りは変わらなければならない。エクスパンスでの直近の危機が過ぎた後、ダルゴナスに戻ることを許可しよう」
languages.original_text: "I understand your desire. Traditions and old ways must change — I will allow you to return to Dargonus after the immediate crisis in the Expanse has passed."

traits.locale_text: 「望みは理解している。伝統と古い仕来りは変わらなければならない。エクスパンスでの直近の危機が過ぎた後、ダルゴナスに戻ることを許可しよう」

languages.text: «Entiendo ese deseo. Las tradiciones y las costumbres del pasado deben cambiar. Le permitiré regresar a Dargonus una vez haya pasado la crisis inminente en la Extensión».
languages.original_text: "I understand your desire. Traditions and old ways must change — I will allow you to return to Dargonus after the immediate crisis in the Expanse has passed."

traits.locale_text: «Entiendo ese deseo. Las tradiciones y las costumbres del pasado deben cambiar. Le permitiré regresar a Dargonus una vez haya pasado la crisis inminente en la Extensión».

languages.text: "Arzularını anlıyorum. Gelenekler ve eski adetler değişmeli. Enginlik'teki mevcut krizin çözülmesi durumunda Dargonus'a dönmene müsaade edeceğim."
languages.original_text: "I understand your desire. Traditions and old ways must change — I will allow you to return to Dargonus after the immediate crisis in the Expanse has passed."

traits.locale_text: "Arzularını anlıyorum. Gelenekler ve eski adetler değişmeli. Enginlik'teki mevcut krizin çözülmesi durumunda Dargonus'a dönmene müsaade edeceğim."
